page.name: Science National Honors Society
page.description: A science-based honors society based upon character, leadership, and service. Through guest speakers and enrichment sessions, we enrich our Mason community with scientific opportunities. We serve as scientific leaders serving to help our peers foster and develop a passion for science. Within the club, we offer opportunities for our members to engage in team-based experiments and design challenges through our monthly meetings.
page.additionalName: Science National Honors Society Leadership Team
